sentence.text: She flung her arms around him .
She flung herself into his arms and looked up imploringly .
Janet … came running in , flung her arms round Cookie and gave her a smacking kiss .
Nick flung his arms round her .
Urquhart flung his arms back and forth across his body to warm them up .
Thérèse flung her arms wide and broke into sobs .
She flung her arms round him , her face buried in his soaking coat .
The cast are not always as economical with their actions as the miser is with his money , mistaking shouting and flinging their arms about as a substitute for comedy .
She tossed the end of her red scarf over her shoulder , flung back her head and strode over to him .
Larry clicked a pair of castanets he found in Lee 's attic above his fair head and stamped his feet on the kitchen floor and flung his head back .
She flung her head back and resumed her graceful stride .
Nicolo had flung his head back ; he was laughing as if she had just told the world 's funniest joke .

He saw Owen redden with pleasure , and laughed , flinging an arm about his shoulders so forgetfully that it was a worthy as well as a willing sacrifice Owen made for him , containing the pain of the embrace .
He flung himself in a chair and closed his eyes , giving way to sleep .
Milton flung himself in his chair and buried his head in his hands .
Then Mitch Cook flung himself in the way of a goalbound Gary Bennett drive after Rimmer had squirmed free down the left .
Alain flung himself into a chair , his lips twisted into the old sardonic smile .
Then he turned and flung himself into his nanny 's arms .
Mary gave one horrified glance at it , then flung herself madly into the ditch at the side of the lane .
Grant flung himself to one side … but this time he was just a split second too late .
Then he flung himself neatly across to the bed , thinking agreeably of life with Fred and Daisy as he went , and another spring broke .
At which point two other giant rats sprang from the lower part of the building , jaws agape , and flung themselves at her .
Isabel fell back , flinging her hands up to protect her head .
Jenna looked across towards the barn and then flung herself back beside him to lie watching the clouds scudding across the blue sky .
She flung out her hands .
